## About

Juan Idrovo combines legal expertise with hands-on software engineering. He builds custom software and automations while guiding businesses through compliance certifications. His background includes a cybersecurity postgraduate diploma from UT Austin, software engineering and cybersecurity diplomas from BrainStation (Konrad Group), financial accounting certificate from Harvard Business School Online, and AWS cloud certification.

Experience includes supporting SOC 2 Type II certification at Kriptos Inc. (monitoring security controls, triaging vulnerabilities) and delivering 37,000+ lines of production code for enterprise software.

## Services

- Compliance Consulting: SOC 2 Type I/II, ISO 27001 certification guidance
- Custom Software Development: Full-stack web applications, internal tools
- Business Process Automation: Workflow optimization, integration development
- Data Security Consulting: Security architecture, vulnerability assessment
- Legal Tech Solutions: AI-powered legal tools, document automation

## Projects

### Markatzy (markatzy.com)
AI-powered trademark protection platform with real-time, multi-dimensional conflict detection. Analyzes brands across phonetic, typographic, semantic, and visual dimensions. Searches 500,000+ trademarks in under 100ms. Built with Next.js 15, tRPC, pgvector, and OpenAI.

### Update Manager (kriptos.io)
Windows agent installation orchestrator for enterprise IT departments. Enables secure deployment and management of software across thousands of client computers at banks and multinationals.

### Cuarenta (cuarenta.juanidrovo.com)
Digital implementation of the traditional Ecuadorian card game with real-time multiplayer via WebSockets and AI opponents.

### Grace Nelson Law (gracenelsonlaw.com)
Complete website and digital infrastructure for a bilingual expat-focused law firm. Multi-language support, appointment booking, CRM systems.

### La Pampa E-commerce (lapampaec.com)
Full-stack e-commerce platform with Next.js 15 storefront and Medusa.js v2 headless backend.
